name: Precious Sleep
description:
You are the Spirit of Dreams.

Fight the Dream Demons to keep your human asleep and delay their inevitable return to work.

---------

HOW TO PLAY

  1. Stay away from the dream demons:
    The ALARM MONSTER will reduce your sleepiness score!
    The glow from the CANDLE will reduce your sleepiness score!
  2. Pick up sleeping pills! They will increase your sleepiness score!
  3. Use cherry bombs to destroy the dream demons (SPACEBAR TO PLANT BOMB)
  4. Don’t get distracted by your inbox!

WASD to move. Spacebar to use a bomb. Rebind controls via settings.

---------
Uses SilentWolf for the online leaderboard: https://silentwolf.com/
